description:
A simple tool which helps to sync the clipboard between computers by using a shared folder


What's Changed
- Fix Polling Harder trying to read the same file over and over again by @felipecrs in 16b1919
- Update dependency electron to ^34.2.0 by @renovate in #178
- Update dependency electron-store to ^10.0.1 by @renovate in #170
- Update dependency electron-log to ^5.3.0 by @renovate in #174
- Update dependency electron-vite to v3 by @renovate in #182
- Update electron-forge monorepo to ^7.7.0 by @renovate in #185
- Update dependency semver to ^7.7.1 by @renovate in #171
- Update dependency vite to ^6.1.1 by @renovate in #186
